meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mitch Rodricks Alex Miller Murphy Eric R. Backes Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7929.

td.p: Mitch Rodricks, an attorney from Oakland, California
Alex Miller Murphy, a public relations specialist from Washington, D.C.
Eric R. Backes, an attorney and government relations professional from Round Rock, Texas (whose 3-day cash winnings total $91,201)

tr.td: THE TOP 25 ROMANTIC COMEDIES
(Alex: According to a list put together by Vanity Fair.)
QUOTES OF NOTE
BRANDIMALS
MOUNTAINS & VALLEYS
"URRY" UP
& WAIT TABLES

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'He stars in No. 4, No. 7 & No. 16:

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
